title: When you solo carry a game as Support

replies.body: Rito: OMG, A Support carried a game? Better nerf them so this doesn't happen again.
Riot- "We feel the need to make ADC's more useful and more important in a teamcomp they are highly underrated."

The only thing is....

How can you even kharry with support?
go {{champion:99}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:161}} and hope ur enemy laners spoon feed ur lane
{{champion:63}}
{{champion:43}}

I love brand support :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-4PZt5qcl7c
you could say that but those are kharry supports, i mean with legit supports that shit aint happening.
*carry
ive done it before, nami and with poppy, legit everyone thanks anyone other then you f***ing annoying but im a masochist sup main meh

Well once isn't going to win you a game. Especially when you got supports going full aggro and adcs doing jackshit. I mean i've played with good supports, but oftenly the lack of communication just shits on us, that's why I never play bot unless forced.

I play bot/jungle. i can save 3 lanes as a jungle, and as an adc i can stop 2 people from feeding and knock it down to one or less with myself down there.

my entire play style literally revolves around me finding a way to reduce ally feeding as much as possible. kinda sad.

best part is playing as ADC and being able to figure out of your supp is any good in the first 5 minutes, and then spending the next 10 seeing if they're smart enough to adapt to you playing adc instead of being the ones like 
"I dove why didnt you follow?"
"bad idea. if i dont go in get out." and then diving again when they come back. smart ones watch the adc, bad ones try to make the adc make plays instead of waiting for the opening.

ADC is fun when you realize you can say "Fuck 'em" to the supp and play your way if you can get yourself the win. dont ever let anyone dictate the plays you make if they cant even make good ones. focus on you and carry.

the fact that support is already the hardest role to do exactly what you say in and riot nerfs any actual supports that can but leaves mages that go bot alone is why support role is so poor  in addition to being the least popular role there just arent enough supports to go around. when the role could sill be least popular by at least have enough players to keep up with the rest of the roles in an ideal situation

Ever play Thresh or Leona while on point?

That's how. Sweetest feeling in the world knowing you're just a support, but you're the sole reason the other team can't do jack shit to you or your team.
yeah, since most supports (other than mage ones and carry ones have little to no damage :( )
I'd say any champion in the game can carry when played mechanically well, but if you're melee in support and dont you hit the most hp in game, i feel bad for you son

Ya, the worst are the ADCs who complain that you stole their kills and get very toxic when many of the kills you got were solo no-assist kills which becomes very evident when you add up your kills and assists to their kills and assists. You'd have more since they did not participate in the kills you got.
I know this feeling all to well. but at least the enemy team notices and complains that how I play is broken.

Done that several times:
{{champion:267}} Successfully dominated the bottom lane solo and proceeded to 2v1 them after telling the ADC to hang back and take the minions while I took the champions.
{{champion:43}} Had to drag a Miss Fortune to victory because she was "experimenting" with her build. Eventually it culminated in 2v1ing a Yi and Rengar backdoor attempt 50 minutes in while my team took their nexus (That was, without doubt, the hardest I have ever tried in LoL).
{{champion:223}} Split-push Kench baby. ZZ'Rot, full hp, and Banner of Command. Everyone played with the enemy team up top and I ran bot to push down two turrets before ulting up to help the team. Rinse and repeat as needed until they were outrotated and their inhibs were down.
I played Soraka and healed the shit out of my adc, it was disgusting even to me and then the enemy says "wish we had your adc".. I was like bruhhhhhh

so raka cant even heal much at a time and is limited by her hp unless she has warmogs on and working wont regen fast enough to do much. most people are just too stupid to stop attack the adc for 1 second and kill the squishy support with the spell that has her kill her self
LOL this had me dying

Old taric {{champion:44}} used to do all the time same with{{champion:89}}  and {{champion:201}}  before the nerfs.... im sorry shift of where the champions power lies. adcs can cry about 1-2 second cooldown increases but fuck if supports complain that their already neglible damageis getting taken away for more to be put into sunlight procs that none of your allies ever take into account or try to proc
Sht 6 ges with brand won 6 games and in 5 out of 6 ges i did most dmg of the team
#feelsbadman
except you don't carry as a support
oh yes you do carry as a support

Its not impossible just the hardest of any other role  there fore it happens the least there fore you hear of it the least. and when it happens people dont recouldnise it so it often isnt credited so carries towards supports are lost into a void
